document.full_text: the key prosecution witness testifying about the planning of the 2008 pakistani militant raid on mumbai said on thursday he may have been wrong to divulge the plot to his friend and accused co-conspirator, a pakistan-born chicago businessman.
document.title: witness challenged in u.s. trial on mumbai attack
lines_and_colors: the key prosecution witness testifying about the planning of the 2008 pakistani militant raid on mumbai said on thursday he may have been wrong to divulge the plot to his friend and accused co-conspirator, a pakistan-born chicago businessman.
